summary: This is an email from October 26, 2020, regarding the Epstein investigation, sent from an FBI email address to multiple recipients including the USAO NYS and USAHUB. It appears to be internal DOJ/FBI communication about the investigation.

persons.name: Paul Byrne
persons.context: Appears as a recipient (Cc) of an email regarding the Epstein investigation, indicating involvement in the case.

keyFacts: Internal DOJ/FBI email communication about the Epstein investigation dated October 26, 2020.
Email sent from an FBI email address to multiple recipients including USAO NYS and USAHUB.
The subject is 'RE: Epstein investigation', indicating ongoing discussion about the case.
